Menaḥem ben Shemu᾿el and his daughter Maraviglia bat Menaḥem ben Shemu᾿el: inscribed with their names in the colophon, 26 Kislev 5[2]30 [1469] (folio 112r).Folio 113: originally belonged to a different manuscript, written in a different but contemporary script, with coloured marginal illuminations on both sides of the leaf.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
